oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tackling discursive challenge: institutional consumers' ambiguous response to organic message
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Mikkola, M.
Roos, G.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Food systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Tackling the discursive challenges of societal and ecological communication about organic food is proposed as a new strategy for the organic message to get through.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Mikkola, M. and Roos, G. (2009) Tackling discursive challenge: institutional consumers' ambiguous response to organic message. In: Programme, abstracts, list of participants, Nordic Association of Agricultural Scientists, 5 (2), NJF Report, p. 77.
